thread.title: River Road Chateau
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by River Road Chateau

author: River Road Chateau
title: River Road Chateau
text: I ordered candle covers, and one arrived broken. One quick call to customer service and they had a replacement cover on its way to me, and I didn't even have to hassle with returning the damaged one. They sure make it easy!
